revision.text: Possibly: A defence of natural and revealed religion: being an abridgment of the sermons preached at the lecture founded by the Hon[ble] Robert Boyle, by Gilbert Burnet. (London : Printed for Arthur Bettesworth and Charles Hitch, at the Red-Lion in Pater-noster Row, MDCCXXXVII. [1737]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2407721~S1
